body: FMC growing her hair means she moved on and doesn't love the MC anymore, MC is stupid for calling FMC just childhood friend what a prick! He fucking deserved it!

Holy fuck shut up. "Theyre not a couple so its not ntr" you have no fucking clue what youre talking about. Learn what the word actually means, it's not just a synonym for cheating. It means stolen love -any form of love, tons besides an pfficial relationship- so this absolutely is ntr. Extreme ntr in fact - it's the whole point of what the author intended by showing scenes from their past where the guy getting ntrd was falling in love with the girl; their lifelong love is stolen by sexual pleasure --that is the entire purpose of the story. God you "not ntr" people are tedious.
Oh god the chars look alike I thought there was only 2 people invovled lol

I think the four of them are just friends but the other guy at page 4 is in love with the girl that the other dude is fucking, this shit is not NTR they are not couple, they just are childhood friends.

This looks like some kind of exhibition foursome between two couples that turns into NTR (partner switch) after the big titty girl daydreams about the other guy's dick after peeing in the middle of the night (around page 44). I think it's confusing because the two guys look pretty alike. I only differentiated them by the way the direction their bangs are facing.
What is going on here, I'm goddamn lost

She got her long hair back in the end. 
If you watch bakemonogatari, this means character development.
